description: Browser automation agent that navigates higgsfield.ai to generate videos, tracks prices, with full observability dashboard

userStories.title: Initialize Node.js project with Stagehand
userStories.description: Set up the project with Stagehand browser automation framework
acceptanceCriteria: package.json with stagehand, typescript, playwright dependencies

userStories.title: Create base browser agent with Stagehand
userStories.description: Implement core agent.ts that can navigate websites using Stagehand
acceptanceCriteria: Logs all actions to logs/ directory

userStories.title: Build observability logger
userStories.description: Create logging system for full SDLC observability
acceptanceCriteria: Logs: timestamp, action, duration, success/failure, screenshots
Append-only log files in logs/ directory
userStories.notes: Completed - logger.ts with JSON Lines format

userStories.title: Implement Higgsfield AI navigator
userStories.description: Agent that can navigate higgsfield.ai and interact with video generation
acceptanceCriteria: Can navigate to video generation page

userStories.title: Add price tracker
userStories.description: Track and store Higgsfield AI pricing over time
acceptanceCriteria: Tracks: plan name, price, credits, date

userStories.title: Create observability dashboard
userStories.description: HTML dashboard showing logs, iterations, and metrics

userStories.title: Add video generation workflow
userStories.description: Complete workflow to generate a video on Higgsfield AI
userStories.notes: Completed - video-generator.ts created (requires login for actual generation)

userStories.title: Create demo-ralph-loop.ts
userStories.description: Demonstration script showing Ralph loop pattern without network
userStories.notes: Completed - demo runs successfully showing all 3 iterations
